blocks.name: tgrest
blocks.content: A subspace can be generated by restricted sets from a basis for the original topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: resttop
blocks.content: A subspace topology is a topology. Definition of subspace topology in [Munkres] p. 89. ` A ` is normally a subset of the base set of ` J ` . (Contributed by FL, 15-Apr-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm resttop(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), ctop))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(c0, crest, c1), ctop, cfv(ctg, co(c0, crest, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqtrd(cfv(ctg, co(c0, crest, c1)), co(c0, crest, c1), co(cfv(ctg, c0), crest, c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)))
  tgrest(c0, ctop, c1, c2)
  oveq1d(cfv(ctg, c0), crest, c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), c0))
  tgtop(c0)
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(ctg, co(c0, crest, c1)), ctop), wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), ctb))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, ctb))
  topbas(c0)
  restbas(c0, c1)
  tgcl(co(c0, crest, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm resttop(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c0[|`t]c1)‚àà Top)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((c0[|`t]c1), ctop, (topGen `(c0[|`t]c1)), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  eqtrd((topGen `(c0[|`t]c1)), (c0[|`t]c1), ((topGen ` c0)[|`t]c1), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  tgrest(c0, ctop, c1, c2)
  oveq1d((topGen ` c0), crest, c1, c0, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚àà c2, (topGen ` c0)= c0)
  tgtop(c0)
  3syl((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (topGen `(c0[|`t]c1))‚àà Top, c0 ‚àà TopBases, (c0[|`t]c1)‚àà TopBases)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà TopBases)
  topbas(c0)
  restbas(c0, c1)
  tgcl((c0[|`t]c1))
}

blocks.name: resttopon
blocks.content: A subspace topology is a topology on the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

thm resttopon(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(ctopon, c2)))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(co(c0, crest, c2))))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), ctop), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c2, universe))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  resttop(c0, c2, universe)
  eqssd(c2, cuni(co(c0, crest, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wss(c2, cuni(co(c0, crest, c2))), wcel(c2, co(c0, crest, c2)))
  eqeltrrd(c2, co(c0, crest, c2), cin(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(cin(c1, c2), c2), wss(c2, c1))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1))
  sseqin2(c2, c1)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cin(c1, c2), co(c0, crest, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c1, c0))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, c0))
  elrestr(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), c2, universe, c1)
  elssuni(c2, co(c0, crest, c2))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wss(cuni(co(c0, crest, c2)), c2), wss(co(c0, crest, c2), cpw(c2)))
  eqsstrd(co(c0, crest, c2), cpw(c2), crn(cmpt(hs0, c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wceq(co(c0, crest, c2), crn(cmpt(hs0, c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, c0))
  id(wss(c2, c1))
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  ssexg(c2, c1, c0)
  restval(hs0, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), c2, universe)
  frnd(cmpt(hs0, c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2)), cpw(c2), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  fmpttd(hs0, c0, cin(cv(hs0), c2), cpw(c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), c2), cpw(c2)))
  mpbir(wcel(cin(cv(hs0), c2), cpw(c2)), wss(cin(cv(hs0), c2), c2))
  inss2(cv(hs0), c2)
  elpw(cin(cv(hs0), c2), c2)
  inex1(cv(hs0), c2)
  vex(hs0)
  sspwuni(co(c0, crest, c2), c2)
  istopon(co(c0, crest, c2), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
}

thm resttopon(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí(c0[|`t]c2)‚àà(TopOn ` c2))

  syl2an2r(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, (c0[|`t]c2)‚àà Top, c0 ‚àà Top, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  topontop(c0, c1)
  resttop(c0, c2, universe)
  eqssd(c2, ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c2), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), c2 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c2), c2 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c2))
  eqeltrrd(c2, (c0[|`t]c2), (c1 ‚ãÇ c2), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1))
  sylib((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (c1 ‚ãÇ c2)= c2, c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  sseqin2(c2, c1)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), (c1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àà(c0[|`t]c2), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà c0)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, c1 ‚àà c0)
  elrestr(c0, (TopOn ` c1), c2, universe, c1)
  elssuni(c2, (c0[|`t]c2))
  sylib((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1), ‚ãÉ(c0[|`t]c2)‚äÜ c2, (c0[|`t]c2)‚äÜ P(c2))
  eqsstrd((c0[|`t]c2), P(c2), ran((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2))), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, (c0[|`t]c2)= ran((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2))), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl2anr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚äÜ c1, c1 ‚àà c0)
  id(c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  ssexg(c2, c1, c0)
  restval(hs0, c0, (TopOn ` c1), c2, universe)
  frnd((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)), P(c2), c0, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1))
  fmpttd(hs0, c0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), P(c2), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1))
  a1i(((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àà P(c2))
  mpbir((hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àà P(c2), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚äÜ c2)
  inss2(hs0, c2)
  elpw((hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), c2)
  inex1(hs0, c2)
  vex(hs0)
  sspwuni((c0[|`t]c2), c2)

thm restco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(co(co(c0, crest, c2), crest, c4), co(c0, crest, cin(c2, c4))))
} = {
  3eqtr4a(co(co(c0, crest, c2), crest, c4), co(c0, crest, cin(c2, c4)), crn(cmpt(hs0, crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))), cin(cv(hs0), c4))), crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), cin(c2, c4)))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  3eqtr4i(crn(cmpt(hs0, crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))), cin(cv(hs0), c4))), crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), cin(c2, c4)))), cab(hs2, wrex(hs0, cab(hs3, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs3), cin(cv(hs1), c2)))), wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs0), c4)))), cab(hs2, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs2), cin(cv(hs1), cin(c2, c4))))))
  abrexco(hs2, hs0, hs3, hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2), cin(cv(hs0), c4), cin(cv(hs1), cin(c2, c4)))
  inex1(cv(hs1), c2)

  ineq1(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2), c4)
  inass(cv(hs1), c2, c4)
  rnmpt(hs2, hs0, cmpt(hs0, crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))), cin(cv(hs0), c4)), cab(hs3, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs3), cin(cv(hs1), c2)))), cin(cv(hs0), c4))
  mpteq1i(hs0, crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))), cin(cv(hs0), c4), cab(hs3, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs3), cin(cv(hs1), c2)))))
  rnmpt(hs3, hs1, cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2)), c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))
  eqid(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2)))
  rnmpt(hs2, hs1, cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), cin(c2, c4))), c0, cin(cv(hs1), cin(c2, c4)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), cin(c2, c4))))
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, crest, c2), crest, c4), crn(cmpt(hs0, crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))), cin(cv(hs0), c4))), co(crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))), crest, c4), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  oveq1d(co(c0, crest, c2), crest, c4, crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(co(crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))), crest, c4), crn(cmpt(hs0, crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))), cin(cv(hs0), c4)))), wcel(crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))), universe), wcel(c4, c5))
  syl6eqelr(crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2))), universe, co(c0, crest, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(co(c0, crest, c2), crn(cmpt(hs1, c0, cin(cv(hs1), c2)))))

  mpteq1i(hs0, ran((hs1 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ‚ãÇ c2))), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c4), { hs3 | ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs3 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c2))})

blocks.name: restabs
blocks.content: Equivalence of being a subspace of a subspace and being a subspace of the original. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Jul-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm restabs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(co(co(c0, crest, c3), crest, c2), co(c0, crest, c2)))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, crest, c3), crest, c2), co(c0, crest, c2), co(c0, crest, cin(c3, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c4)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(co(co(c0, crest, c3), crest, c2), co(c0, crest, cin(c3, c2))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c2, universe))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c4))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c4))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c2, universe))
  ssexg(c2, c3, c4)
  restco(c0, c1, c3, c4, c2, universe)
  oveq2d(c0, crest, cin(c3, c2), c2, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c4)))
  sylib(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(cin(c3, c2), c2), wss(c2, c3))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c4))
  sseqin2(c2, c3)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c4)‚Üí((c0[|`t]c3)[|`t]c2)=(c0[|`t]c2))

  sylib((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c4), (c3 ‚ãÇ c2)= c2, c2 ‚äÜ c3)

blocks.name: restin
blocks.content: When the subspace region is not a subset of the base of the topology, the resulting set is the same as the subspace restricted to the base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm restin(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, crest, c2), co(c0, crest, cin(c2, c4))))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c0))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, crest, c2), co(c0, crest, cin(c2, c4)), co(co(c0, crest, c4), crest, c2), co(c0, crest, cin(c4, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(co(c0, crest, c4), crest, c2), co(c0, crest, cin(c4, c2))), wcel(c4, universe))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, universe))
  syl5eqel(c4, universe, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  3com23(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, universe), wceq(co(co(c0, crest, c4), crest, c2), co(c0, crest, cin(c4, c2))))
  restco(c0, c1, c4, universe, c2, c3)
  oveq1d(co(c0, crest, c4), crest, c2, c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(c0, crest, c4), c0))
  restid(c0, c1, c4)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, crest, cin(c4, c2)), co(c0, crest, cin(c2, c4))))
  oveq2i(c0, crest, cin(c4, c2), cin(c2, c4))
  incom(c4, c2)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0[|`t]c2)=(c0[|`t](c2 ‚ãÇ c4)))

  restco(c0, c1, c4, universe, c2, c3)

blocks.name: restcldi
blocks.content: A closed set is closed in the subspace topology. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm restcldi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, co(c3, crest, c0))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c3))
} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, co(c3, crest, c0))), wrex(hs0, cfv(ccld, c3), wceq(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)), wss(c2, c0)), wrex(hs0, cfv(ccld, c3), wceq(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)), wceq(c2, cin(c2, c0)))
  simp2(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)), wss(c2, c0))
  3ad2ant3(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)), wss(c2, c0), wceq(c2, cin(c2, c0)))
  biimpi(wss(c2, c0), wceq(c2, cin(c2, c0)))
  dfss(c2, c0)
  rspceeqv(hs0, c2, cfv(ccld, c3), c2, cin(c2, c0), cin(cv(hs0), c0))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  syl2anc(w3a(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)), wss(c2, c0)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, co(c3, crest, c0))), wrex(hs0, cfv(ccld, c3), wceq(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)))), wcel(c3, ctop), wss(c0, c1))
  3ad2ant2(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(c3, ctop))
  cldrcl(c2, c3)
  simp1(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)), wss(c2, c0))
  restcld(hs0, c3, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ccld, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c2, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  biimpi(c2 ‚äÜ c0, c2 =(c2 ‚ãÇ c0))

blocks.name: restcldr
blocks.content: A set which is closed in the subspace topology induced by a closed set is closed in the original topology. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm restcldr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, co(c1, crest, c0)))), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c1)))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, co(c1, crest, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c1)))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, co(c1, crest, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c1)), wrex(hs0, cfv(ccld, c1), wceq(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0))))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, co(c1, crest, c0))), wrex(hs0, cfv(ccld, c1), wceq(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)))), wcel(c1, ctop), wss(c0, cuni(c1)))
  cldrcl(c0, c1)
  cldss(c0, c1, cuni(c1))
  restcld(hs0, c1, c0, cuni(c1), c2)
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  rexlimdva(hs0, cfv(ccld, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wceq(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c1)))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c1))), wceq(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), c0), cfv(ccld, c1)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), c0), cfv(ccld, c1)))
  incld(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  eleq1(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c0), cfv(ccld, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c1)))
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(Clsd ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Clsd `(c1[|`t]c0)))‚Üí c2 ‚àà(Clsd ` c1))

  ancoms(c0 ‚àà(Clsd ` c1), hs0 ‚àà(Clsd ` c1), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c0)‚àà(Clsd ` c1))

blocks.name: restopnb
blocks.content: If ` B ` is an open subset of the subspace base set ` A ` , then any subset of ` B ` is open iff it is open in ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)

thm restopnb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c4, c3))), wb(wcel(c4, c0), wcel(c4, co(c0, crest, c1))))
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c4, c3))), wcel(c4, c0), wcel(c4, co(c0, crest, c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c4, cin(cv(hs0), c1))))
  impbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c4, c3))), wcel(c4, c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c4, cin(cv(hs0), c1))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c4, c3))), wi(wcel(c4, c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c4, cin(cv(hs0), c1)))), wceq(c4, cin(c4, c1)))
  eqcomd(c4, cin(c4, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c4, c3))))
  sylib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c4, c3))), wceq(cin(c4, c1), c4), wss(c4, c1))
  sstrd(c4, c1, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c4, c3))))
  simpr3(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c4, c3))
  simpr2(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c4, c3))
  df-ss(c4, c1)
  expcom(wceq(c4, cin(c4, c1)), wcel(c4, c0), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(c4, cin(cv(hs0), c1))))
  rspceeqv(hs0, c4, c0, c4, cin(c4, c1), cin(cv(hs0), c1))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c4, c1)
  rexlimdvaa(hs0, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c4, c3))), wceq(c4, cin(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(c4, c0))
  eqeltrd(c4, c0, cin(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wss(c3, c1), wss(c4, c3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(c4, cin(cv(hs0), c1)))))

  eqeltrd(c4, c0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c3), (((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c3))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 =(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1))))
  3eqtr3a(c4, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c3), ((hs0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚ãÇ c3), (hs0 ‚ãÇ(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)), (((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c3))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 =(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1))))
  inass(hs0, c1, c3)
  eqtr3d(((hs0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚ãÇ c3), c4, (c4 ‚ãÇ c3), (((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c3))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 =(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1))))
  ineq1d(c4, c3, (hs0 ‚ãÇ c1), (((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c3))‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c4 =(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1))))
  simprr(((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c3)), hs0 ‚àà c0, c4 =(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1))
  adantrr(((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c3)), hs0 ‚àà c0, c4 =(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1), (c4 ‚ãÇ c3)= c4)

  simplr3((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚äÜ c1, c4 ‚äÜ c3, hs0 ‚àà c0)
  df-ss(c4, c3)

  sylib((((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c4 ‚äÜ c3))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), (c1 ‚ãÇ c3)= c3, c3 ‚äÜ c1)

blocks.name: ssrest
blocks.content: If ` K ` is a finer topology than ` J ` , then the subspace topologies induced by ` A ` maintain this relationship. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssrest(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wss(co(c2, crest, c3), co(c0, crest, c3)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c2, crest, c3), co(c0, crest, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c3)))
  mpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3)))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3)))
  3imtr4d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c3)), wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c3))), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c3))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3)), wi(wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c3))), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c3)))))
  ssrexv(hs1, c2, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c3)))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3)), wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c3)))), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  elrest(hs1, c2, universe, c3, universe, cv(hs0))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, crest, c3)), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c3)))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, universe))
  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3)))
  simprd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3))), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  nsyl2(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(co(c2, crest, c3), emptycls))
  n0i(cv(hs0), co(c2, crest, c3))
  ndmov(c2, universe, c3, crest)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(crest), cxp(universe, universe)), wfn(crest, cxp(universe, universe)))
  restfn()
  fndm(crest, cxp(universe, universe))
  elrest(hs1, c0, c1, c3, universe, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, crest, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, crest, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
}

thm ssrest(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0)‚Üí(c2[|`t]c3)‚äÜ(c0[|`t]c3))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, (c2[|`t]c3), (c0[|`t]c3), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0))
  ex((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0), hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3), hs0 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c3))
  mpd(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3)), hs0 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c3), hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3))
  simpr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0), hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3))
  3imtr4d(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3)), hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3), hs0 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c3), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c3)), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c3)))
  ad2antlr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c0, hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3), (‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c3))‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c3))))
  ssrexv(hs1, c2, c0, hs0 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c3))
  syl(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3)), (hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, hs0 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c3))), (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå))
  elrest(hs1, c2, universe, c3, universe, hs0)
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3)), (hs0 ‚àà(c0[|`t]c3)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 =(hs1 ‚ãÇ c3))), c0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  simpll(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c0, hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3))
  simprd(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3)), c3 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0), hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3), (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå))
  nsyl2(hs0 ‚àà(c2[|`t]c3), (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå), (c2[|`t]c3)= ‚àÖ)
  n0i(hs0, (c2[|`t]c3))
  ndmov(c2, universe, c3, crest)
  ax-mp(dom(|`t)=(ùïå √ó ùïå), |`t[Fn](ùïå √ó ùïå))
  restfn()
  fndm(crest, (ùïå √ó ùïå))
  elrest(hs1, c0, c1, c3, universe, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((c2[|`t]c3))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[|`t]c3))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
}

blocks.name: restopn2
blocks.content: If ` A ` is open, then ` B ` is open in ` A ` iff it is an open subset of ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm restopn2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, crest, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wss(c2, c1))))
} = {
  biancomd(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, co(c0, crest, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wss(c2, c1))

thm neitr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnei, co(c0, crest, c1)), c3), co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c3), crest, c1)))

blocks.content: A closure in a subspace topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: restntr
blocks.content: An interior in a subspace topology. Willard in _General Topology_ says that there is no analogue of ~ restcls for interiors. In some sense, that is true. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 23-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: restlp
blocks.content: The limit points of a subset restrict naturally in a subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm restlp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c4), c3), cin(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c3), c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, crest, c1))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cfv(cfv(clp, c4), c3), cin(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c3), c1), w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)))
  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clp, c4), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c3), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c4), cdif(c3, csn(cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c3, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))

  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c4), cdif(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))), cin(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))), c1), w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)))
  syld3an3(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c4), cdif(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))), cin(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))), c1)), wss(cdif(c3, csn(cv(hs0))), c1))
  ssdifssd(c3, csn(cv(hs0)), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)))
  restcls(c0, c1, c2, cdif(c3, csn(cv(hs0))), c4)

  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clp, c4), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c4), cdif(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c4, ctop), wss(c3, cuni(c4)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(c4, ctop), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  topontop(c4, c1)
  sseqtrd(c3, cuni(c4), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wceq(c1, cuni(c4)), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  syl5eqel(c4, cfv(ctopon, c1), co(c0, crest, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wss(c1, c2))
  sylib(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  toptopon(c0, c2)
  resttopon(c0, c2, c1)
  toponuni(c4, c1)
  islp(c4, c3, cuni(c4), cv(hs0))
  eqid(cuni(c4))
  syl5bb(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c3), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c3, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  elin(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c3), c1)
  anbi1d(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c3, csn(cv(hs0))))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdif(c3, csn(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c3, c2))

  islp(c0, c3, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfv(clp, c4), c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c3), c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)))

thm restlp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1)‚Üí((limPt ` c4)` c3)=(((limPt ` c0)` c3)‚ãÇ c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ c0

} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, ((limPt ` c4)` c3), (((limPt ` c0)` c3)‚ãÇ c1), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1))
  3bitr4d((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), hs0 ‚àà((limPt ` c4)` c3), hs0 ‚àà(((limPt ` c0)` c3)‚ãÇ c1), hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c4)`(c3 \ { hs0 })), (hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c3 \ { hs0 }))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  syl6bb((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c4)`(c3 \ { hs0 })), (hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c3 \ { hs0 }))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), hs0 ‚àà(((cls ` c0)`(c3 \ { hs0 }))‚ãÇ c1))
  eleq2d(hs0, ((cls ` c4)`(c3 \ { hs0 })), (((cls ` c0)`(c3 \ { hs0 }))‚ãÇ c1), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1))
  syld3an3(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚äÜ c2, c3 ‚äÜ c1, ((cls ` c4)`(c3 \ { hs0 }))=(((cls ` c0)`(c3 \ { hs0 }))‚ãÇ c1), (c3 \ { hs0 })‚äÜ c1)
  ssdifssd(c3, { hs0 }, c1, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1))
  restcls(c0, c1, c2, (c3 \ { hs0 }), c4)
  elin(hs0, ((cls ` c0)`(c3 \ { hs0 })), c1)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), (hs0 ‚àà((limPt ` c4)` c3)‚Üî hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c4)`(c3 \ { hs0 }))), c4 ‚àà Top, c3 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c4)
  syl((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), c4 ‚àà Top, c4 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  topontop(c4, c1)
  sseqtrd(c3, ‚ãÉ c4, c1, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1))
  syl((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), c1 = ‚ãÉ c4, c4 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  syl5eqel(c4, (TopOn ` c1), (c0[|`t]c1), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), (c0[|`t]c1)‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c2), c1 ‚äÜ c2)
  sylib((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c2), c0 ‚àà Top)

  resttopon(c0, c2, c1)
  toponuni(c4, c1)
  islp(c4, c3, ‚ãÉ c4, hs0)

  syl5bb((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚äÜ c1), hs0 ‚àà(((limPt ` c0)` c3)‚ãÇ c1), (hs0 ‚àà((cls ` c0)`(c3 \ { hs0 }))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà((limPt ` c0)` c3)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  elin(hs0, ((limPt ` c0)` c3), c1)

blocks.name: restperf
blocks.content: Perfection of a subspace. Note that the term "perfect set" is reserved for _closed_ sets which are perfect in the subspace topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm restperf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cperf), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, crest, c1))
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cperf), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c3), cuni(c3)), cuni(c3)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cperf), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c3), cuni(c3)), cuni(c3))), wcel(c3, ctop))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, ctop), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  topontop(c3, c1)
  baib(wcel(c3, ctop), wcel(c3, cperf), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c3), cuni(c3)), cuni(c3)))
  isperf(c3, cuni(c3))
  eqid(cuni(c3))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c3), cuni(c3)), cuni(c3)), wceq(cin(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1), c1))
  sseqin2(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))
  eqeq12d(cin(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1), c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c3), cuni(c3)), cuni(c3), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  eqtr3d(cin(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1), cfv(cfv(clp, c3), cuni(c3)), cfv(cfv(clp, c3), c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, c3), c1), cin(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1)), wss(c1, c1))
  ssid(c1)
  restlp(c0, c1, c2, c1, c3)
  fveq2d(cfv(clp, c3), c1, cuni(c3), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, cuni(c3)), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  syl5eqel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1), co(c0, crest, c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  sylanb(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  toptopon(c0, c2)
  resttopon(c0, c2, c1)
  toponuni(c3, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm restperf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí(c3 ‚àà Perf ‚Üî c1 ‚äÜ((limPt ` c0)` c1)))
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c0[|`t]c1)
} = {
  bitr4d((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), c3 ‚àà Perf, c1 ‚äÜ((limPt ` c0)` c1), ((limPt ` c3)` ‚ãÉ c3)= ‚ãÉ c3)
  syl((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), (c3 ‚àà Perf ‚Üî((limPt ` c3)` ‚ãÉ c3)= ‚ãÉ c3), c3 ‚àà Top)
  syl((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), c3 ‚àà Top, c3 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  topontop(c3, c1)

  syl5bb((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), c1 ‚äÜ((limPt ` c0)` c1), ((limPt ` c3)` ‚ãÉ c3)= ‚ãÉ c3, (((limPt ` c0)` c1)‚ãÇ c1)= c1)
  sseqin2(c1, ((limPt ` c0)` c1))
  eqeq12d((((limPt ` c0)` c1)‚ãÇ c1), c1, ((limPt ` c3)` ‚ãÉ c3), ‚ãÉ c3, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  eqtr3d((((limPt ` c0)` c1)‚ãÇ c1), ((limPt ` c3)` ‚ãÉ c3), ((limPt ` c3)` c1), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  mp3an3(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚äÜ c2, ((limPt ` c3)` c1)=(((limPt ` c0)` c1)‚ãÇ c1), c1 ‚äÜ c1)
  ssid(c1)
  restlp(c0, c1, c2, c1, c3)
  fveq2d((limPt ` c3), c1, ‚ãÉ c3, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  syl((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), c1 = ‚ãÉ c3, c3 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  syl5eqel(c3, (TopOn ` c1), (c0[|`t]c1), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2))
  sylanb(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚äÜ c2, (c0[|`t]c1)‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c2))
  toptopon(c0, c2)
  resttopon(c0, c2, c1)
  toponuni(c3, c1)
}

blocks.name: perfopn
blocks.content: An open subset of a perfect space is perfect. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm perfopn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, cperf))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, crest, c1))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, cperf), wcel(c2, ctop), wral(hs0, cuni(c2), wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c2))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  topontop(c2, c1)
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wral(hs0, cuni(c2), wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c2))), wral(hs0, c1, wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c2))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c2)))
  mtod(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))
  syldan(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  perfi(c0, cv(hs0), c3)
  syl5bi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), co(c0, crest, c1)))
  eleq2i(csn(cv(hs0)), c2, co(c0, crest, c1))
  syl6bi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), co(c0, crest, c1)), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), c1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), co(c0, crest, c1)), wa(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), c1))))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0), wb(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), co(c0, crest, c1)), wa(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  restopn2(c0, c1, csn(cv(hs0)))
  simpl(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c0), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), c1))
  raleqdv(hs0, c1, cuni(c2), wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wn(wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wceq(c1, cuni(c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  syl5eqel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1), co(c0, crest, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wss(c1, c3))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c0, ctop))
  perftop(c0)
  toptopon(c0, c3)
  syl6sseqr(c1, c3, cuni(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c1, cuni(c0)))
  elssuni(c1, c0)
  resttopon(c0, c3, c1)
  toponuni(c2, c1)
  isperf3(hs0, c2, cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cperf), wcel(c1, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm perfopn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c2 ‚àà Perf)
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ c2 =(c0[|`t]c1)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), c2 ‚àà Perf, c2 ‚àà Top, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c2, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c2))
  syl((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), c2 ‚àà Top, c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  topontop(c2, c1)
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c2, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c2))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c1, (c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c2)
  mtod(((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), { hs0 } ‚àà c2, { hs0 } ‚àà c0)
  syldan((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c3)
  sselda(hs0, c1, c3, (c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0))
  adantlr(c0 ‚àà Perf, c1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c3, ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c0)
  perfi(c0, hs0, c3)
  syl5bi(((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), { hs0 } ‚àà c2, { hs0 } ‚àà c0, { hs0 } ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1))
  eleq2i({ hs0 }, c2, (c0[|`t]c1))
  syl6bi(((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1), { hs0 } ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1), { hs0 } ‚àà c0, ({ hs0 } ‚àà c0 ‚àß { hs0 } ‚äÜ c1))
  adantr((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), hs0 ‚àà c1, ({ hs0 } ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1)‚Üî({ hs0 } ‚àà c0 ‚àß { hs0 } ‚äÜ c1)))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà Perf, c1 ‚àà c0, ({ hs0 } ‚àà(c0[|`t]c1)‚Üî({ hs0 } ‚àà c0 ‚àß { hs0 } ‚äÜ c1)), c0 ‚àà Top)
  restopn2(c0, c1, { hs0 })
  simpl({ hs0 } ‚àà c0, { hs0 } ‚äÜ c1)
  raleqdv(hs0, c1, ‚ãÉ c2, (c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), ¬¨ { hs0 } ‚àà c2)
  syl((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), c1 = ‚ãÉ c2, c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  syl5eqel(c2, (TopOn ` c1), (c0[|`t]c1), (c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), (c0[|`t]c1)‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c1 ‚äÜ c3)
  sylib((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c0 ‚àà Top)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà Perf, c1 ‚àà c0, c0 ‚àà Top)
  perftop(c0)
  toptopon(c0, c3)
  syl6sseqr(c1, c3, ‚ãÉ c0, (c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà Perf, c1 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0)
  elssuni(c1, c0)
  resttopon(c0, c3, c1)
  toponuni(c2, c1)
  isperf3(hs0, c2, ‚ãÉ c2)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà Perf ‚àß c1 ‚àà c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: resstopn
blocks.content: The topology of a restricted structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm resstopn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, crest, c1), cfv(ctopn, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, cress, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, c3))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(co(c0, crest, c1), cfv(ctopn, c2)), wcel(c1, universe))
  3eqtr3g(co(c0, crest, c1), cfv(ctopn, c2), co(co(cfv(cts, c3), crest, cfv(cbs, c3)), crest, c1), co(cfv(cts, c2), crest, cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c1, universe))
  eqtrd(co(co(cfv(cts, c3), crest, cfv(cbs, c3)), crest, c1), co(cfv(cts, c2), crest, cfv(cbs, c2)), co(cfv(cts, c3), crest, cin(cfv(cbs, c3), c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  mp3an12(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(co(co(cfv(cts, c3), crest, cfv(cbs, c3)), crest, c1), co(cfv(cts, c3), crest, cin(cfv(cbs, c3), c1))), wcel(cfv(cts, c3), universe), wcel(cfv(cbs, c3), universe))
  fvex(cts, c3)
  fvex(cbs, c3)
  restco(cfv(cts, c3), universe, cfv(cbs, c3), universe, c1, universe)
  oveq12d(cfv(cts, c3), crest, cin(cfv(cbs, c3), c1), cfv(cts, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), wcel(c1, universe))
  resstset(c1, universe, cfv(cts, c3), c2, c3)
  syl5eq(cin(cfv(cbs, c3), c1), cfv(cbs, c2), cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(c1, universe))
  incom(cfv(cbs, c3), c1)
  ressbas(c1, universe, cfv(cbs, c3), c2, c3)
  oveq1i(co(cfv(cts, c3), crest, cfv(cbs, c3)), crest, c1, c0)
  eqtr4i(co(cfv(cts, c3), crest, cfv(cbs, c3)), c0, cfv(ctopn, c3))
  topnval(cfv(cts, c3), cfv(cbs, c3), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cts, c3))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, crest, c1), cfv(ctopn, c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  syl(wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(co(c0, crest, c1), emptycls), wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  con3i(wcel(c1, universe), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  ndmov(c0, universe, c1, crest)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(crest), cxp(universe, universe)), wfn(crest, cxp(universe, universe)))
  restfn()
  fndm(crest, cxp(universe, universe))
  3eqtr3g(cfv(ctopn, c2), emptycls, co(cfv(cts, c2), crest, cfv(cbs, c2)), co(emptycls, crest, cfv(cbs, c2)), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  oveq1d(cfv(cts, c2), crest, cfv(cbs, c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cts, c2), emptycls, cfv(cts, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fveq2d(cts, c2, emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  syl5eq(c2, emptycls, co(c3, cress, c1), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  ovprc2(c1, c3, cress)
  reldmress()
  str0(cts, nat9)
  df-tset()
  topnval(cfv(cts, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cts, c2))
  0rest(cfv(cbs, c2))
}

thm resstopn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[|`t]c1)=(TopOpen ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(c3[|`s]c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(TopOpen ` c3)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0[|`t]c1)=(TopOpen ` c2), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  3eqtr3g((c0[|`t]c1), (TopOpen ` c2), (((TopSet ` c3)[|`t](Base ` c3))[|`t]c1), ((TopSet ` c2)[|`t](Base ` c2)), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqtrd((((TopSet ` c3)[|`t](Base ` c3))[|`t]c1), ((TopSet ` c2)[|`t](Base ` c2)), ((TopSet ` c3)[|`t]((Base ` c3)‚ãÇ c1)), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  mp3an12(c1 ‚àà ùïå, (((TopSet ` c3)[|`t](Base ` c3))[|`t]c1)=((TopSet ` c3)[|`t]((Base ` c3)‚ãÇ c1)), (TopSet ` c3)‚àà ùïå, (Base ` c3)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(cts, c3)
  fvex(cbs, c3)
  restco((TopSet ` c3), universe, (Base ` c3), universe, c1, universe)
  oveq12d((TopSet ` c3), crest, ((Base ` c3)‚ãÇ c1), (TopSet ` c2), (Base ` c2), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  resstset(c1, universe, (TopSet ` c3), c2, c3)
  syl5eq(((Base ` c3)‚ãÇ c1), (Base ` c2), (c1 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c3)), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  incom((Base ` c3), c1)
  ressbas(c1, universe, (Base ` c3), c2, c3)
  oveq1i(((TopSet ` c3)[|`t](Base ` c3)), crest, c1, c0)
  eqtr4i(((TopSet ` c3)[|`t](Base ` c3)), c0, (TopOpen ` c3))
  topnval((TopSet ` c3), (Base ` c3), c3)
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  eqid((TopSet ` c3))
  eqtr4d((c0[|`t]c1), (TopOpen ` c2), emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl(¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå, (c0[|`t]c1)= ‚àÖ, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  con3i(c1 ‚àà ùïå, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  ndmov(c0, universe, c1, crest)
  ax-mp(dom(|`t)=(ùïå √ó ùïå), |`t[Fn](ùïå √ó ùïå))
  restfn()
  fndm(crest, (ùïå √ó ùïå))
  3eqtr3g((TopOpen ` c2), emptycls, ((TopSet ` c2)[|`t](Base ` c2)), (‚àÖ[|`t](Base ` c2)), ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  oveq1d((TopSet ` c2), crest, (Base ` c2), emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6eqr((TopSet ` c2), emptycls, (TopSet ` ‚àÖ), ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fveq2d(cts, c2, emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c2, emptycls, (c3[|`s]c1), ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  ovprc2(c1, c3, cress)
  reldmress()
  str0(cts, nat9)
  df-tset()
  topnval((TopSet ` c2), (Base ` c2), c2)
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((TopSet ` c2))
  0rest((Base ` c2))
}

blocks.name: resstps
blocks.content: A restricted topological space is a topological space. Note that this theorem would not be true if ` TopSp ` was defined directly in terms of the ` TopSet ` slot instead of the ` TopOpen ` derived function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm resstps(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), ctps))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), ctps), wcel(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), crest, c1), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c1)))))
  eleqtrd(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), crest, c1), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c1))), cfv(ctopon, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sylanb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(cfv(ctopn, c0), crest, c1), cfv(ctopon, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopon, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  istps(c0, cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  resttopon2(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), c1, c2)
  fveq2d(ctopon, cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cin(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c1))))
  ressbas(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), co(c0, cress, c1), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  istps(co(c0, cress, c1), co(cfv(ctopn, c0), crest, c1), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c1)))
  resstopn(cfv(ctopn, c0), c1, co(c0, cress, c1), c0)
  eqid(co(c0, cress, c1))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm resstps(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà TopSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c0[|`s]c1)‚àà TopSp)
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà TopSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c0[|`s]c1)‚àà TopSp, ((TopOpen ` c0)[|`t]c1)‚àà(TopOn `(Base `(c0[|`s]c1))))
  eleqtrd(((TopOpen ` c0)[|`t]c1), (TopOn `(Base `(c0[|`s]c1))), (TopOn `(c1 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0))), (c0 ‚àà TopSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  sylanb(c0 ‚àà TopSp, c1 ‚àà c2, ((TopOpen ` c0)[|`t]c1)‚àà(TopOn `(c1 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0))), (TopOpen ` c0)‚àà(TopOn `(Base ` c0)))
  istps(c0, (TopOpen ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  resttopon2((TopOpen ` c0), (Base ` c0), c1, c2)
  fveq2d(ctopon, (c1 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0)), (Base `(c0[|`s]c1)), (c0 ‚àà TopSp ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà TopSp, c1 ‚àà c2, (c1 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0))=(Base `(c0[|`s]c1)))
  ressbas(c1, c2, (Base ` c0), (c0[|`s]c1), c0)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  istps((c0[|`s]c1), ((TopOpen ` c0)[|`t]c1), (Base `(c0[|`s]c1)))
  eqid((Base `(c0[|`s]c1)))
  resstopn((TopOpen ` c0), c1, (c0[|`s]c1), c0)
  eqid((c0[|`s]c1))
  eqid((TopOpen ` c0))
}
